notes: Template already uses semantic CSI styles (CSILevel0-5) consistently applied to all content paragraphs.
No style creation or pStyle changes needed—existing styles already provide the required CSI hierarchy mapping.
CSILevel0 serves dual purpose: section title (para 0) and END OF SECTION (para 29).
Paragraphs 12, 16, 17, 22, 26, 27, 28 are empty/placeholder paragraphs—styles preserved as-is.
SectionID role omitted because section number and name are combined in a single paragraph (para 0).
